main event: A witness observed a round, dull silver or grey object hovering above the trees, later moving slowly in a northeastern direction before rapidly disappearing from view.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 50 to 60 feet in diameter and hovered at about 100 feet above the ground., The object made no noise during observation and appeared to rotate slowly., The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes., The witness could not identify the object as any conventional aircraft., The object suddenly accelerated and disappeared at a high rate of speed.
witness description: The individual who stopped his car to observe the object.
